title: Moto X3M Dead Ahead
description: Racing game enthusiasts, are you ready? This is a game that's going to make your adrenaline skyrocket - Moto X3M Dead Ahead! It's an exciting blend of motor, driving, and even a bit of shooting. Driving a cool motorcycle, take your partner with you and race through tricky tracks.The game offers thrilling driving action as you avoid obstacles like wrecked cars, fallen debris, and explosive traps.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Aidan in Danger
description: Aidan in Danger is an exciting platformer where you play as Aidan, a young red-haired elf armed with a slingshot. Your mission is to protect Drakor, the last dragon on Earth, from an interdimensional villain bent on world domination. Battle dangerous monsters, travel through time, and navigate challenging levels in this epic adventure. With immersive gameplay, stunning graphics, and a gripping story, help Aidan save Drakor and restore peace to the land!
instructions: AD / left and right arrow keys = move to the left and right W / up arrow key = jump C / K = roll X / J = shoot Space = dash P / Tab = pause

title: Greedy Snake : Brain Hole Explosion
description: This is a level based puzzle game where players will transform into a greedy snake and challenge different levels.Players need to make flexible judgments and plan their movement paths reasonably in order to safely eat apples and reach the finish line smoothly, winning the level victory.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cougar Simulator: Big Cats
description: Experience life as a powerful cougar in a vast open world! Customize your big cat’s appearance, find a mate, and raise a family that aids in hunting and battles. Level up your skills, complete quests, and compete against other felines. Explore diverse environments filled with various animals, from farm creatures to fierce predators. Hunt, survive, and prove your strength in this immersive wild adventure!
instructions: - WASD or ←↑→↓ to move - Left Mouse Button to attack - Space to jump - Shift to run

title: Stealth Master Sneak Cat
description: Stealth Master: Sneak Cat is a fun stealth adventure game that lets you play the role of a cute cat. You will sneak through various missions! Move quietly under the close watch of enemies and surveillance equipment.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Robbotto
description: Robbotto is an arcade platformer with a retro esthetic. Play alone or with a friend as you travel through the ship defeating all the enemies.
instructions: Use the arrow keys to navigate the menu. Enter to select. Play with keyboard or mouse.

title: Obby Massive Attack
description: Help the Obby blox friends to rescue the hapless citizens of a city. During the adventure, you'll get bonuses that give you superpowers that will allow you to sweep aside everything in your path. Obby Masive Attack is the ideal game for anyone who loves the running game genre. This time, Obby and friends are the protagonist - the game offers fast gameplay, nice graphics, special effects and good playability. Collect coin and buy new power ups, and run forever in this fantastic endless adventure.
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Infinite runner; Many characters to unlock; Cute Graphics; Power ups and shop, Use the Touch or mouse to Jump

title: Mine Jump
description: Jump into action! ? Test your logic and reflexes in this addictive game. Collect slugs, upgrade your hero, and uncover the secrets of a mysterious planet! ?✨
instructions: Jump, jump, jump! A challenging reaction and logic game that won't let you get bored! Collect slugs, pump up your hero and find the edge of this planet! Click on the left or right side of the screen to move diagonally on a cell. If you make a mistake, you can go back. Get as far as you can to find out all the secrets of this mysterious planet!

title: Geometry Vibes X-Ball
description: Geometry Vibes X-Ball is ready to give you a completely different gaming experience! After the first game of the series, interactive new levels, challenge section and completely new store are waiting for you in X-Ball mode. Start your new adventure now in Geometry Vibes X-Ball game where you will find yourself avoiding obstacles, traps and gears in each level!
instructions: Click to "MOUSE LEFT-CLICK" or "UP ARROW" and hold to fly up. Release the button to dive down. In 2,3,4 Player game modes, other players are controlled with "UP ARROW", "H" and "L".

title: Fish Shooting Fish Hunter
description: Want to begin a fun and relaxing fishing adventure? In Fish Shooting - Fish Hunter, you’ll become a fishing master. Use your skills and quick reflexes to catch various fish while enjoying a laid-back casual experience!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: JailBreak : Escape from Prison
description: Experience the thrill of jailbreak escape, find a way out to freedom in our adventure filled jailbreak games! In this exciting jailbreak escape journey, you’ll take on the role of a character trapped behind jail bars, where every level presents unique challenges and exciting mini games, leading to the final goal of prison escape. Your goal in this prison games? Outsmart the system, solve clever puzzles, and find a way out in this immersive jailbreak escape adventure.
instructions: Move with Joystick and use jump buttons

title: Royal Kitchen: The Lost King
description: In a lost kingdom, disaster has struck! During a knight’s tournament, a mysterious figure in a black cloak suddenly appears. The stranger casts a spell on the king, causing him to vanish without a trace right before everyone’s eyes! The princess manages to escape from the castle, but where should she go now? How can she save her father and the entire kingdom? Will she be able to overcome all the challenges, find her father, and defeat the evil wizard?
instructions: The controls are quite simple: click on objects highlighted in green, gather resources, clear obstacles with them, and accomplish your objectives. Develop your strategy at the start of each level and achieve your goal! Every second counts!

title: Count Master Match Color Run
description: Count Master: Match Color Run is a colorful running game where you lead a group of little characters in a color-matching race! In this exciting arcade challenge, collect characters of the same color to grow your team. Merge them for a bigger squad, aiming for the highest score. Avoid hammers, spikes, etc. Collect characters of the same color to expand your team.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Squid Escape Game
description: You must escape from this iron-covered labyrinth prison. Both blue players need to escape the prison. You must collect all the geometric shapes. Collect all the shapes and find both keys. Find the keys and run to the door. Be very careful, there are thorny obstacles on the ground. Don't stray too far from your friend; if you lose each other, you will lose the game.
instructions: *Use the WASD keys and the Arrow keys to move. *Both players must reach the door safely and complete the level. *You must collect all the shapes in the level.

title: Pet Runner
description: Pet Runner is a fast-paced platformer where your pet runs forward automatically, and you must jump, dodge obstacles, defeat enemies, and collect coins. Play in Endless Mode for infinite fun or tackle unique challenges in Level Mode. Use up to three lives, hit checkpoints, and complete daily challenges to earn coins. Unlock and customize adorable pets in the shop to enhance your adventure. With its exciting gameplay and charming rewards, Pet Runner offers fun for all ages!
instructions: On Desktop: Press "Arrow Up" to Jump, Press and Hold "Arrow Down" to Crouch On Mobile: Swipe Up to Jump, Swipe Down and Hold to Crouch

title: Obstacle Car Driving
description: Obstacle Car Driving is an exciting and challenging endless driving game where precision and reflexes are key! Navigate through four unique environments, each packed with unpredictable obstacles that will test your driving skills. Choose from four different cars, each with its own handling and performance, and collect in-game currency as you drive. Use your earnings to unlock new vehicles and themes
instructions: For computer, Use Up Arrow Key, Right Arrow Key, W or D to move forward User Down Arrow Key, Left Arrow Key, S or A to move backward Press Space to Pause and Resume the game For Mobile, Use the pedals to move forward and backward

title: Building Mods For Minecraft
description: Building Mods For Minecraft is the ultimate game for those who love to build and fight. If you’re a Minecraft fan looking for a new adventure, this game takes the building mechanics of Minecraft to the next level, combining construction with action. You’ll have access to a wide range of building tools and guns.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Daring Jack
description: Jack, an adventurer, was flying over the sea in his small aircraft. When he reached a jungle island, his aircraft's engine failed and he lost control. He escaped from the crashing aircraft, landed safely on the island, and now must find a boat to leave. He knows of the old boathouse on the island but is uncertain how to reach it. Guide him through the jungle to the boathouse. Help him gather items for survival, focusing on securing food and shelter while navigating the challenging terrain.
instructions: Using mouse or tap to control

title: Idle Legend
description: Dive into an exciting world! Fight monsters, gather battle energy, unlock bosses, and defeat them to earn coins. Spend coins on upgrades, skins, and pets. Enjoy vibrant cartoon graphics and exciting quests. Start your adventure today!
instructions: Move between zones, fight monsters, gather energy, unlock bosses, defeat them, and upgrade your hero.

title: Escape or Die - Troll Devil Levels
description: Escape or Die: Troll Devil Levels, you’re thrust into a nightmarish world where trolls, twisted by ancient demonic curses, guard labyrinthine dungeons filled with deadly traps and unspeakable horrors. Your mission? Escape each level with devil alive— or end up as another soul devoured by the Troll Devil’s wrath. With ever-changing challenges and escalating danger, only the quickest, smartest, and bravest will survive.
instructions: Arrow keys or Touch Buttons

title: Mighty Run
description: Mighty Run is an action-packed platformer where you jump, dodge obstacles, and defeat enemies to progress. Collect gifts along the way and reach the end to grab the diamond, unlocking the next level. Use power-ups, master tricky jumps, and overcome challenges in this thrilling adventure. With smooth controls and exciting gameplay, every level is a test of skill. Can you collect all the rewards and reach the finish line? Play Mighty Run now and prove your skills!
instructions: Controls for Mighty Run: Left Arrow – Move Left Right Arrow – Move Right Up Arrow – Jump

title: Doge Rush Draw Home Puzzle
description: Welcome to Doge Rush: Draw Home Puzzle! It's full of lovely adventures. There are two ways to play this game. In the Animal family party, you should help the dog and cat find their food and guide them home, drawing a line between the dog and cat's correct food. And avoid them bumping into each other. If they hit, they will get dizzy and the game will fail.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Easy Obby Jump and Run Challenge Online
description: Easy Obby: Jump and Run Challenge Online is a highly dynamic game where you jump across platforms, climbing higher and higher! Overcome tricky traps, avoid dangerous obstacles and prove that your reflexes are at their best. Can you make it to the top?
instructions: PC: WASD - move Space - jump TAB - pause F - dash Shift - show cursor Mouse wheel forward/backward - zoom in/out the camera Hold RMB to rotate the camera Mobile: Use the game interface

title: Sprunki Beats
description: Sprunki Beats takes you on a rhythmic adventure through four exciting levels, featuring both horror and normal modes. Explore unique environments as you master the beats and uncover secrets. Fans of Sprunki will love the thrilling challenges, including hints of Mustard mods and connections to the iconic Phase 5. What is Sprunki? It’s the ultimate rhythm game experience, blending mystery and excitement. Dive into Sprunki Beats and prove your skills in this must-play journey!
instructions: On Desktop: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK On Mobile: Use Touch Controls

title: DTA 2: Maniac
description: DTA 2: Maniac. Create chaos like GTA. Use a vast arsenal of weapons, steal bulldozers, buses, police cars, tanks and much more - destruction is all around!
instructions: Get out into the city and look for adventure. Automatic targeting of the nearest enemy. WSDA - character control Left mouse button - hit or shoot Spacebar - perform a roll E - get into the car

title: Escape Room Mystery Key
description: Escape Room Mystery Key is an intense escape room adventure filled with horror and puzzle elements. Choose a role to enter an abandoned school or a hospital. Uncover hidden clues and keys to find your way out. In this game, you must carefully examine every detail in the room, searching for hidden clues.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stickman Choosing actions
description: The Stickman character was kidnapped by a creature and locked up in prison. Your task is to escape from prison. Use an item selection or action. What should I choose? Left or right? It's up to you.
instructions: Use a computer mouse or control with a touch! Different items will appear on the left and right. You need to choose the item that will allow you to continue your gaming adventure.

title: BouncePop Quest
description: Guide Jumpo, a squishy and color-changing jelly creature, through over 150 vibrant levels filled with tricky obstacles, moving platforms, and environmental hazards. Charge and release powerful jumps to collect stars, dodge enemies, and unlock new worlds—from the icy peaks to fiery lava lands. Master timing, aim for achievements, and power up in this cute, bouncy adventure!
instructions: Press, hold, and release to jump! With double-side jump active, tap left to jump left, right to jump right!

title: Cyberpunk: Corporation
description: The corporation takes control of the city. You are the only one who can fight back and free the inhabitants. Enlist the support of local residents by completing their tasks. Activate the robot and break through the defense line.
instructions: WASD = move Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel / 1-5 = change weapons Left-shift = run C = crouch E = interact Space = Jump

title: Youtuber Mcraft 2Player
description: You need to help the YouTuber girl and her boyfriend escape from prison. In this two-player adventure, they must collect all the YouTube plaques without getting too far apart, obtain the key and the golden plaque, and reach the chest. Open the chest and run to the door. You need to be very fast, you must escape from prison!
instructions: *Use the "WASD" and "Arrow keys" to move. *Double Jump available. *Collect all YouTube plaques and find the key. *After finding the key, reach the chest.

title: Quackventure
description: Join Quack, the brave duck, on an exhilarating journey through a magical forest brimming with wonder and hidden secrets. Explore enchanting landscapes, solve intriguing mysteries, and embark on an adventure filled with thrilling surprises and endless excitement at every corner!
instructions: In Quackventure, you control a charming duck using the classic WASD keys and the Spacebar. Guide the duck as it navigates obstacles and flees from a menacing giant purple monster. Along the journey, collect power-ups to boost the duck’s abilities or unlock new skins to showcase your style. Can you lead the duck to safety while avoiding the hazards in your path?

title: Mystical Blade 3D
description: Enter the world of Mystical Blades, where you design and battle your own B-Blades! Mix blades, rings, and elements to create powerful combos, then face players worldwide in thrilling battles. With stunning graphics and realistic physics, prove your skills and become the ultimate B-Blades master!
instructions: Use the mouse or touchscreen to play the game.

title: Spider Evolution
description: Transform into the ultimate spider in Spider Evolution! Start small, grow stronger, and outsmart rivals on a vibrant track. Merge, dodge, and strategize to become the apex arachnid. Experience thrilling hyper-casual gameplay and dominate the spider world!
instructions: Keyboard arrow keys or A D keys to control player to move left or right, or use mouse control with right slider or left slide.

title: Stickman in space
description: You have to play as a Stickman astronaut who is stuck on the moon. Use all possible ways to leave the moon and get to our planet Earth. On the way you will encounter various dangers, such as aliens, flying meteorites and much more. You will have several objects in your hands with which you can try to escape from the natural satellite of the moon. Several objects will lead you to death, and some objects can save your life, be careful and cautious.
instructions: Find two successful ways to escape from the Moon. Use your computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or your finger.

title: Stickman Punishment
description: When a mysterious radiation blast grants Stickman and his friends superpowers, heartbreak quickly turns into a quest for revenge! Betrayed by his best friend over a girl, Stickman discovers he can morph into any shape imaginable. Now, he’s ready to use his new abilities to create chaos and keep the pair apart. Dive into this action-packed story filled with unique animations, clever payback strategies, and endless creativity!
instructions: Use a computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, then use a stylus or a finger. It is necessary to watch the story animation and choose a way to punish the Stickman. You need to click on the buttons to see all the punishments of the Stickman.

title: Spinning Uia Uia Cat Bricker
description: Spinning Uia Uia Cat Bricker is a fun and addictive brick-breaking game where a lively cat motivates you with cheerful meows. Your goal is to clear all the bricks without dropping the ball. As you break more bricks, the cat gets even more excited, dancing and playing around. With colorful graphics and dynamic gameplay, this game offers a delightful experience for players of all ages. Stay sharp and keep up!
instructions: Play with mouse.

title: Super Cloner 3D
description: In Super Cloner 3D, you are a unique super cloner on a mission to infiltrate dangerous environments. Use your cloning powers to escape traps, kill enemies, and accomplish secret missions.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Geometry Stars
description: Enjoy the Geometry Stars world with a brand new adventure! New levels, new music, new monsters, new everything!. Flex your clicky finger as you jump, fly and flip your way through dark caves and spiky obstacles. Collect many stars as you can to upgrade your famous characters and find the secrets of this Rhythm-based adventure.
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Action Music; Frenetic adventure; Awesome HD Graphics; Upgrade system, Use the Touch or mouse to play

title: Obby The Legendary Dragon
description: Experience the thrill of an addictive pet-catching simulator, perfect for Pokémon fans! Explore diverse Roblox worlds and level up your heroes all in one exciting adventure. Gather health, upgrade your hero, and unlock incredible new worlds to discover. Catch pets in battles, hatch them from cases and eggs, and trade or purchase them to build a team of powerful allies and friends. Earn money, climb the ranks, and enhance your Obby character with prestigious titles and upgrades!
instructions: PC control: AWSD - running; Space - jump; Tab - hide/show the cursor; Mouse - turn. On smartphones:

title: Fish Land Fish World
description: Explore a colorful underwater world full of fishing excitement. In Fish Land - Fish World, you’ll become a fishing expert in this relaxing idle fishing adventure! This game combines simulation and fishing elements. Allow you to fish, expand your pond, and grow your aquatic world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sigma Boy: Musical Clicker
description: To get started with Sigma Boy: Musical Clicker, simply tap on Sigma Boy to earn points. Use these points to purchase upgrades that boost Sigma Boy's abilities. As Sigma Boy evolves, he will move from the desert to new, more advanced environments, eventually embarking on a cosmic journey. Each level presents unique challenges, so keep clicking, upgrading, and evolving to help Sigma Boy conquer them all.
instructions: To get started with Sigma Boy: Musical Clicker, simply tap on Sigma Boy to earn points.

title: Jumping Fish: Ragdoll 3D
description: Experience a fun and challenging ragdoll adventure where you control a jumping fish! Time your jumps, adjust power, and navigate through tricky levels. Reach checkpoints to unlock new areas filled with obstacles and surprises. Can you master the perfect jump and complete all levels?
instructions: LMB Up/Down – Adjust Jump Power (Hold, Adjust, Release) RMB – Control Camera Direction

title: Stickman Prison and Love
description: In Stickman Prison and Love, help Stickman escape from jail after a daring heist for love! With a mysterious package from his sweetheart, carefully choose your tools to plan his escape. Every decision shapes the twists of this story-driven adventure—can Stickman reunite with his true love?
instructions: Find a single, successful way to escape from prison.Use a computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, then use a stylus or a finger.

title: Minicraft Winterblock
description: Winter has arrived, and everything is covered in snow. In the snow-covered forest, you must be very careful to survive. You need to find two chests and collect all the snowballs. But be cautious, there are monsters everywhere waiting to eat you. You must defeat the monsters and reach the hidden portal at the end of the level. You must leave the house safely and pass through the portal.
instructions: *Played with WASD + Arrow Keys. *Mobile touch control is available. **Jump on monsters and crush them to kill them

title: Jailbreak. Roblox jumper
description: In this thrilling game with a cubic style, the character attempts to escape from prison by progressing through levels, each represented as a separate platform. On each level, you'll need to collect coins that help speed up your escape, but be careful: dangerous traps and obstacles await at every turn. A wrong move or misstep could cost you your life. Navigate through each level, avoid the threats, and move closer to freedom!
instructions: PC: WSAD or Arrows. Mobile: Swipes. Tablet: Swipes.

title: Scary BanBan Escape
description: Scary Players of the realistic survival horror game BanBan Escape will need to devise a plan to get out of a terrifying kindergarten inhabited by terrifying creatures. The game's intriguing storyline and tense atmosphere have garnered a lot of attention in the gaming community, and it all started with Euphoric Brothers. In Banban Kindergarten, the protagonist is huggy, who plays the role of the searcher. Not only is this school deserted, but it also hides several perils and mysteries.
instructions: Instructions : Move around the map to try to escape each level before the monsters find you and you can't escape. Controls: WASD to move around the map Spacebar to jump Mouse to move the camera F to interact with items

title: Geometry Vibes
description: Geometry Vibes is a reaction-based arcade game where you avoid obstacles, traps and spikes that come at you in waves. Your goal in the game is to keep your arrow on the route and take it as far as possible. The game includes a classic mode with levels, a race mode (2-3-4 players) where you can do multiple races, and an endless mode where you can test yourself! Geometry Vibes, where the excitement never ends, invites you to challenge...
instructions: Click to "MOUSE LEFT-CLICK" or "UP ARROW" and hold to fly up. Release the button to dive down. In 2,3,4 Player game modes, other players are controlled with "UP ARROW", "H" and "L".

title: Block Digger
description: Dig, Click, and Get Rich! In Block Digger, every tap brings you closer to fortune! Smash stones, collect coins and crystals, and upgrade your mine to skyrocket your earnings. Unlock new mines, chase achievements, and build your mining empire. It's easy, fun, and totally addictive—start digging today! ⛏️
instructions: Tap the screen or click with your mouse to smash stones, earn rewards, and upgrade your mine!

title: Elemental Monsters: Merge & Evolution
description: Welcome to the world of "Elemental Monsters: Merge & Evolution"! This free online game is perfect for children and teenagers. Develop your logic and strategic thinking while taking part in epic battles with monsters. You will control an army of fire, water, earth and air elementals in an exciting battle to liberate their worlds.
instructions: ⚔️Battles: Take part in battles and defeat opponents to earn coins. ?Coins: Use coins to buy, sell and upgrade your heroes. ?Units: Each unit has unique characteristics such as health, damage and attack speed. ?Merge: Combine units to create a more powerful monster. You can also combine units from different elements to create unique warriors. ?Chests: Don't forget to open chests to get extra coins and bonuses.

title: Happy Brothers
description: The New Year has arrived, and the two siblings have decorated the house beautifully. The siblings are very happy, but they want to go outside. To leave the house, they need to find the key and the yellow diamond. If they find both and activate the portal, they can escape the house. The two siblings, wearing Christmas clothes, begin searching for the key inside the house. They also need to gather the gift boxes.
instructions: *Press the "WASD" keys or the Arrow Keys to move. *Double jump is available. *Playable on both PC and mobile. *Collect all the required items.
